description: To the tune of 'Awesome Mixtape # 2', the gang's Adventure continues in Marvel Studios' 'Guardians of the Galaxy, Vol 2', where they travel in the outer borderland of the cosmos. The guards have to fight to keep their newfound family together as they now begin to wallow in the mystery of who Peter Quill's real father is. Old enemies become new allies and favorites from the comic books appear to help our heroes as Marvel's cinematic universe continues to expand.
title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2

description: In Marvel Studios Captain Marvel we get to follow a spectacular Adventure that takes place in the 1990s, where Carol Danvers becomes one of the universe's most powerful heroes. When the Earth ends up in the middle of a galactic war, she meets the young agent Nick Fury, which leads to her continued future as an Avenger!
title: Captain Marvel

description: Walt Disney Animation Studio's film Raya and the Last Dragon takes you to the fantasy world of Kumandra, where humans and dragons lived together in harmony a very long time ago. But when evil attacked, the dragons sacrificed themselves to save humanity. Now, 500 years later, the same evil force has returned. It is up to the lone fighter Raya to find the legendary last dragon to restore the damaged kingdom and its divided people.
title: Raya och den sista draken

description: We fast-forward to the 1980s when Wonder Woman's filmAdventure begins. Here she is faced with a wide range of enemies, including Maxwell Lord and Cheetah.
title: Wonder Woman 1984

description: When Emperor Marcus Aurelius grows old, his son Commodus begins to worry about being outcompeted by those who enjoy his father's favor. The great general Aelius Maximus is therefore sentenced to death, but escapes his executioners. However, he appears in an unexpected situation to the emperor's dismay. Multiple Oscar-winning!
title: Gladiator

description: A simple idea can be invaluable or life-threatening in a future where crimes are committed in the human brain. Don Cobb has a unique ability to steal information directly from the source, when his victims are most vulnerable - in the dream. When it comes to corporate espionage, Cobb is a legend, but it's a reputation that has cost him every chance of a normal life and keeps him on the run. Now he's been offered a chance to win his life back, if he succeeds in one last job. Because it requires him to push the boundaries of what he can to succeed in something no one has been able to do before: plant information in another consciousness. But what could have been a perfect end to a criminal career becomes an impossible challenge to outwit an opponent who seems to be able to anticipate Cobb's every action. No human could have been prepared for what awaits. Except Cobb.
title: Inception

description: Rowan Atkinson is back as the not-so-secret agent in Johnny English Strikes Again. When a cyber attack reveals the identities of all British secret agents, the country's last hope is called in from the quiet existence of the pension. English gets its most important mission to date: To find the brain behind the masterful attack. English must tackle the new challenges of modern technology with its far from sophisticated methods - otherwise his latest assignment may be the last of the intelligence service.
title: Johnny English Strikes Again

description: Men in Black is facing its biggest, most global threat to date: a mole within the Men in Black organization.
title: Men in Black International

description: The year is 1944. Most men are soldiers somewhere in Sweden. At the textile factory Örnen in Ryd, the work is going well among the women, while they listen to Ulla Billquist and dream of peace, real coffee and more men. Then suddenly one day he is standing there at the factory, the engineer and time student Cederquist. A rooster in its best years, with a whole chicken farm to brag about… Lasse Hallström's COUP with Magnus Härenstam in the title role drew as many as 912,000 cinema visitors in 1981 and became one of the biggest Swedish film successes ever. The basis for this film with a wonderfully colorful time environment from the emergency years was Ivar Lo-Johansson's short story 'Kvinnofabriken'.
title: Tuppen

description: Amelie lives in Paris and lives in her own little world. She works in a café and rents an apartment. Life seems to be OK, but a little sad because she is very lonely. But one day everything changes ... After the shocking news that Princess Diana has died, Amelie drops a bottle on the floor. While searching for it, she finds a box filled with childhood memories, which she decides to find the owner of. She secretly returns the box and sees how it cheers up the now middle-aged man. Excited by her success, Amelie decides to make it her task to improve other people's lives as well. She starts with her neighbors. One day she sees how a young man, Nino, in search of torn passport photos at a photo booth, loses his diary. She picks up the hunt for him to return the album and realizes in the meantime that he is the perfect one for her. But how will they ever find each other?
title: Amélie från Montmartre

description: From her birth in Cairo in 1933 to her first concert at the Olympia in Paris in 1956. From her marriage to Lucien Morisse to the top of the disco movement. DALIDA is the story of an unconventional, modern and independent woman who goes through a conventional time where she made a big impression with her extraordinary presence and talent. Despite her tragic death in 1987, her musical heritage lives on.
title: Dalida

description: This is the story of Jared Eamons (Lucas Hedges), the son of the pastor of a small American town, who gets into trouble when his parents (Nicole Kidman and Russell Crowe) discover that their son is gay. The parents struggle to reconcile their son's love with the Christian faith, and for fear of losing family, friends and fellowship, Jared is persuaded to participate in therapy that will cure his homosexuality. But Jared ends up in conflict with the leader (Joel Edgerton) and instead begins to find his own voice and affirm himself as he is.
title: Boy Erased

description: The film centers around an unbalanced family. Therapist Jackie Harper (Helen Hunt) has had an extramarital adventure that puts her on the negative account with police officer Greg (Jon Tenney) and their teenage son Connor (Judah Lewis). Jackie tries in every way to make amends, but it goes slowly
title: I See You

description: GODZILLA, ™ the world's most famous monster, is pitted against evil creatures that, proven by the scientific arrogance of mankind, threaten our existence.
title: Godzilla

description: After sunset, a different kind of life begins. At night, 'Dom' Toretto owns the streets of L.A. Encouraged by his fans, he drives like a pure rock star car race against anyone who dares to challenge him. Among his admirers is Brian, who develops a friendship with him - and falls in love with his sister. The problem is that Brian is working undercover to expose a crime scene where Dom is the main suspect. Soon, both his loyalty and boundaries are tested. The screaming tires never stop in this fast-paced and burnt rubber-scented action thriller where the undercover agent Brian - played by PAUL WALKER (Joyride, She's All That) gets into trouble - both as a police officer and behind the wheel. Dom Toretto is played by VIN DIESEL (Boiler Room), while JORDANA BREWSTER (Faculty) is his sister Mia in this canon film that just has to be seen - with the seat belt on.
title: The Fast and the Furious

description: With about three billion books sold, Agatha Christie is the best-selling author in history! And of all the films based on her work, The Prosecutor's Witness is the most acclaimed, with merits such as six Oscar nominations (including for best film) and a place among the top 70 on IMDb's top list of history's best films.
title: Åklagarens vittne

description: The Snowman, from the executive producer Martin Scorsese, is based on Jo Nesbø's best-selling thriller series. When an elite group of crime detectives led by Harry Hole (Michael Fassbender) investigates a case where a person disappeared during this year's first snowfall, he fears that a serial killer has returned. Together with a brilliant recruit (Rebecca Ferguson), he must connect clues from older unsolved cases with the new ones to outsmart the inconceivable evil before the next snowfall.
title: Snömannen

description: The visionary filmmaker Peter Jackson is back with a new, magnificent Adventure that is unlike anything else. Hundreds of years after the collapse of our civilization, a new world has been formed. An enigmatic young woman named Hester Shaw leads a group of outcast rebels in the fight against London - now a huge city on wheels that threatens to destroy everything in its path.
title: Mortal Engines

description: Strike (Mekhi Phifer) is a 'Clocker', a hard-working, open-minded, drug dealer. When the area's drug lord (Delroy Lindo) tells Strike about an opportunity for promotion, it ends with a langare being killed. Detective Mazilli (John Turturro) wants to make a simple arrest. His partner Rocco (Harvey Keitel) wants to find something much more difficult - the truth.
title: Clockers

description: Spike Lee's epic about the prominent resistance fighter Malcolm X. From his childhood when his pastor's father is killed by the Ku Klux Klan, through his youth when he becomes a petty gangster, to when he comes in contact with the Nation of Islam and their leader Elijah Muhammad. Malcolm soon finds that his distancing from racism and his role in the Nation of Islam have given him many enemies.
title: Malcolm X
